content.title: Kids
content.description: Find out about kids ministry at The Meeting House.

image1.alt: Two parents walking with their young child.

content.text1: Our kids teams walk alongside the next generation in learning to love and follow Jesus, while equipping parents to disciple their kids at home.

content.header2: Scroll down to find a program near you
content.text1: We offer Sunday morning kids programs for Infants to Preschool (ages 0-5), and Grades 1-5. We exist to help kids understand and live Jesus' message, develop relationships through group experiences, equip our community to invest in our kids, and partner with parents as they raise disciples.
